snippet: The University of Texas System includes a database of requests for information, but it does not include the actual records that reporters and other curious Texans sought.
lead_paragraph: The University of Texas System includes a database of requests for information, but it does not include the actual records that reporters and other curious Texans sought.

headline.main: You Can Look, but to Read, You Must Write
headline.print_headline: You Can Look, but to Read, You Must Write
